Expr

Contents

  • Basic operators

Description

This is an implementation of expressions described in a scientific paper titled Data types `a la carte.

Synopsis

  • data (f :+: g) e
    • = Inl (f e)
    • | Inr (g e)
  • class (Functor sub, Functor sup) => sub :<: sup where
    • inj :: sub a -> sup a
